source.ac214c1b:
If we hold all other features fixed except Avg.Session Length then for 1 unit increse in Avg.Session Length is associated with increse in 26 dollars more Spent per year.

For 1 unit increse in Time on App is associated with increse in 38 dollars more Spent per year.

For 1 unit increse in Time on Website is associated with increse in 0.1 dollars more Spent per year.

For 1 unit increse in Length of Membership is associated with increse in 61 dollars more Spent per year.
